description: Summons Azure Empyrea, which gathers enemies and deals 1500% of ATK as Fire DMG to all enemies for 15s (this DMG decays below 85 difficulty), as well as increasing elemental DMG by 30% against all target enemies. Valkyries regain 1 SP every 1 second, have a large increase in Ignore Interrupt, and have a 16% increase in Elemental Breach.
